title: Barbecued Salmon Kebabs
ingredients: ['500g (20 oz) salmon fillets, without skin', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '1 teaspoon minced ginger root', '1 clove garlic, minced', 'pinch of freshly ground black pepper', '3 lemons, cut into 12 wedges', '12 skewers']
